summary: This bill, the Smith River National Recreation Area Expansion Act, aims to expand the Smith River National Recreation Area to include additions in Oregon. It amends the Smith River National Recreation Area Act to modify definitions, boundaries, and administration, including provisions for wildfire and vegetation management, study, and protection of tribal rights. Furthermore, the bill designates several segments of tributaries of the North Fork Smith River in Oregon as Wild and Scenic Rivers, and modifies the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act regarding the Smith River itself. The expansion addresses land acquisition, fish and game, and management planning within the expanded area.
